Welcome to Discover’s documentation!¶

Discover, or Distributed Sensing & Computing Over Sparse Environments, is a platform allowing researchers to study distributed sensing in rural areas. This documentation will provide users with an in-depth explanation of the Discover Portal, which you will use to create, submit, and examine your experiments, along with tutorials on how to use the portal and our hardware.

  • Nodes
  • Rover Examples
